mapper.update: update bidrequestaudithistory set state = #{state,jdbcType=TINYINT}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, auditTime = #{audittime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, applyTime = #{applytime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, auditor_id = #{auditorId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, applier_id = #{applierId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, bidRequestId = #{bidrequestid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, auditType = #{audittype,jdbcType=TINYINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, state, remark, auditTime, applyTime, auditor_id, applier_id, bidRequestId, auditType from bidrequestaudithistory where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
